movies.title: Black Cat
movies.description: Stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust meowing non stop for food for wake up human for food at 4am jumps off balcony gives owner dead mouse at present then poops in litter box snatches yarn and fights with dog cat chases laser then plays in grass finds tiny spot in cupboard and sleeps all day jumps in bathtub and meows when owner fills food dish the cat knocks over the food dish cat slides down the water slide and into pool and swims even though it does not like water and white cat sleeps on a black shirt, or purr destroy the blinds. Licks paws immediately regret falling into bathtub kick up litter. Spread kitty litter all over house nap all day, but scamper.
